description: Holds a set of reusable objects for different aspects of the Arazzo Specification

anyOf.description: An object to hold reusable Failure Actions Objects

value.description: MUST be a valid JSON value serialized as a string. Structure: any. includes properties matching pattern(s) [^x-]. Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

anyOf.description: An object to hold reusable JSON Schema 2020-12 schemas to be referenced from workflow inputs

value.description: MUST be a valid JSON value serialized as a string. This represents a schema reference that could not be resolved. Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

anyOf.description: An object to hold reusable Parameter Objects

value.description: MUST be a valid JSON value serialized as a string. Structure: any. includes properties matching pattern(s) [^x-]. Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

anyOf.description: An object to hold reusable Success Actions Objects

value.description: MUST be a valid JSON value serialized as a string. Structure: any. includes properties matching pattern(s) [^x-]. Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().
